subject: AchHa jo khafa hum se ho tum ae sanam achHa
text:
achHa jo khafa hum se ho tum ae sanam achHa 
lo hum bHee na boleiN ge khuda kee qasam achHa

mashghool kya chahee'e Is dil ko kisee Taur 
le laiwaiN ge DHoonD aur ko'ee yaar hum achHa

garmee ne kuchH Aag aur hee seene maiN laga dee 
her Taur gharaX Aap se milna hai kam achHa

aghyar se karte ho mirre saamne baateeN 
mujH par yeh lage karne niya tum sitam achHa

kah kar ga'e: Aata hoaN ko'ee dam meiN, maiN tum paas 
pHir de chale kal kee see tarah mujH ko dam achHa

Is hast'ee mohoom se maiN tang hoaN Insha' 
wallah keh os se bamraatab 'dam achHa
